items.content_html: Play version 2.4.1 added the ability to hide all shorts from its YouTube channels inbox. This is such a great feature because so many YouTube shorts seem to be empty derivatives of regular videos and don’t make sense when you’re trying to be deliberate about your YouTube viewing with Play.
items.content_text: [Play](https://marcosatanaka.com) version 2.4.1 added the ability to hide all shorts from its YouTube channels inbox. This is such a great feature because so many YouTube shorts seem to be empty derivatives of regular videos and don't make sense when you're trying to be deliberate about your YouTube viewing with Play.
